features: An unscented nourishing toner is the second version of the Original Black Rice Hyaluronic Toner that excluded all essential oil, which makes if fragrance-free.
Fermented 100% Korean-produced black rice extracts(2,000ppm) provide hydration and nourishment deep into the skin enabling the skin to maintain its best condition.
Contains Hyaluronic Acid for moisturizing the skin and Beta-Glucan for enhancing skin regeneration. Gives a boost of hydration and alleviated tightness in the inner layer.
Made with natural ingredients, and gentle watery liquid toner is safe and suitable for all skin types including sensitive skin.
Vegan, Cruelty-Free, 7 types of parabens-Free, 11 harmful substances-Free, Skin irritation test completed, EWG Green for all ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Soothing Symphony for Sensitive Skin - Haruharu Wonder Black Rice Hyaluronic Toner Shines Bright!
reviews.reviewText: I recently discovered a gem in my skincare routine – the Haruharu Wonder Black Rice Hyaluronic Toner, and it has quickly become my go-to for a daily dose of hydration and care. This toner is nothing short of a skincare symphony, providing a harmonious blend of nourishment and gentleness, perfect for my sensitive skin.First and foremost, the fragrance-free formula is a breath of fresh air. Haruharu Wonder has crafted a toner that caters to those with sensitive skin, and the absence of artificial fragrances makes it a delightful experience for my senses. The focus on purity is evident, creating a toner that feels like a gentle hug for my skin rather than an overwhelming assault of scents.The star ingredient, black rice, adds a touch of luxury to this toner. Known for its antioxidant properties, black rice boosts my skin's resilience against environmental stressors. The inclusion of hyaluronic acid takes the hydration game to the next level, leaving my skin feeling plump, dewy, and irresistibly supple.I appreciate the commitment to cruelty-free and vegan practices, as well as the recognition by EWG with a Green rating. It's reassuring to know that I'm not only treating my skin kindly but also making a conscious choice for ethical and environmentally friendly skincare.The alcohol-free formula is a godsend for those with sensitive skin like mine. Instead of stripping my skin of moisture, the Haruharu Wonder Black Rice Hyaluronic Toner complements my skincare routine by delivering a refreshing and hydrating layer that prepares my skin for subsequent steps.The packaging is not only visually appealing but also practical. The pump dispenser allows for a controlled and mess-free application, ensuring that I can enjoy every drop of this wonderful toner without wastage.In conclusion, the Haruharu Wonder Black Rice Hyaluronic Toner is a standout product for sensitive skin. It strikes the perfect balance between efficacy and gentleness, offering a skincare experience that feels like a treat for my skin every day. If you're looking for a toner that cares for your skin and aligns with your ethical values, I wholeheartedly recommend giving this gem a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been experiencing really dry skin lately and saw this recommended by an influencer. I’m glad I took a chance on this product. It’s a textured toner that I’ve never experienced. The consistency is a thin watery gel like which soaks up nicely in my skin to help give the glowy look I prefer. It’s not greasy at all which is a huge plus. For the price, you get a nice size bottle, and it really looks like an expensive skin care product.I have been using this product for about a week now, but I can already see a difference. It keeps my skin moisturized and great for layering my products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using a different toner but wanted to give this one a try. I saw it recommended by a couple dermatologists and estheticians I’ve watched on YouTube. I wanted something to add for hydration in my skin care routine so I use it directly after I wash my face and then follow with a few serums and moisturizer and sunscreen. It works well in my routine and seems to be very hydrating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A staple in my routine
reviews.reviewText: This is a great toner. There’s fermented rice in it, which is a great ingredient. The only complaint I have about it is how sticky it is. It is VERY sticky. I use this with several other toners, so I barely feel it.Texture: Really viscous and sticky.Scent: This is the unscented version.Hydration: it’s okSome people are sensitive to fermented products or rice, so watch out for that. This is a pretty good size, seeing as a little goes a long way. The price of this toner usually stays the same year-round- not too many big deals on amazon. The price is the same on amazon and olive young as of now, so considering shipping, amazon is a better choice. For now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this toner. One of my holy grails that I will definitely repurchase. It's a little thicker than a watery toner, and it's so hydrating. I have sensitive and it doesn't sting or burn or anything. I love it so much. Also, no scent. So that's cool too. Overall I love this toner and am almost out of mine, so I will definitely be repurchasing soon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toner ever
reviews.reviewText: This toner is amazing. It is moisturizing and perfect for all skin type. I have dry sensitive skin and I love this product. I bought this about 4 times now and I don't use any other toner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great step in a routine
reviews.reviewText: Bought this after I ran out of another toner and I will never go back! I use this morning and night as the first step of my skincare routine. The texture of the toner is a little more essence or serum-like (more viscous) than other toners but it feels very moisturizing. Super happy with the price and the convenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this toner for a few months and it is a staple in my routine! My favorite way to incorporate hyaluronic acid in my routine & it keeps my skin so soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One of my absolute favourite toners in the market! As you can see the bottle is nearly empty and this is my 3rd bottle and I will continue to repurchase as this product provides hydration and my skin is more firm and moisturised. I used this everyday morning and night and it doesn't irritate my skin and absorbs really well! If you’re new to Korean skincare I recommend you get this toner and if you haven’t tried this toner then literally go purchase this immediately!

È la prima volta che provo questo prodotto e mi sto trovando bene.Nonostante la consistenza leggermente viscosa, una volta applicato sulla pelle si assorbe subito e lascia la pelle morbida e non appiccicosa.Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo.Inoltre basta una piccola noce di prodotto da applicare su tutto il viso e il gioco è fatto.La confezione è grande, quindi dura a lungo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 17, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Er brennt nicht auf der Haut, ist gut verträglich, riecht nicht und macht fühlbar gepflegtere Haut.Ich habe sehr empfindliche Augen die bei allen möglichen Kosmetikprodukten für das Gesicht oft sofort anfangen zu tränen. Das ist hier absolut nicht der Fall, meine Augen vertragen es gut.Tolles Produkt!

Finora ne ho solo comprato. Gli aspetti positivi- bella confezione- sembra essere una buona composizioneHo voluto acquistare tonico per detergere la mia pelle. È un po' appiccicoso e denso, ma nel complesso sono soddisfatta.
